Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 12:04:27
Folder: C12ZH16 - call for volunteers join emirates red crescent in abu dhabi
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C12ZH16_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-11 12:11
Subject: Call for Volunteers: Join Emirates Red Crescent in Abu Dhabi
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/_h_Acz3fOUSrlYdyuO4Liw/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/_h_Acz3fOUSrlYdyuO4Liw/550486/408F5EFE7CB00F06448E466F6D421353/pexels-cottonbro-6590928.jpg> 	

CALL FOR VOLUNTEERS


As part of the UAE Aid progamme, Emirates Red Crescent in Abu Dhabi is organising a packing initiative for ration kits to be sent to those affected in Lebanon.

The Group has been allocated 20 slots for volunteers to participate in this initiative.

Date: Saturday,12th October 2024
Time: 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM
Location: Abu Dhabi Cruise Terminal, Abu Dhabi Ports, Building No. 1

The Group has been allocated 20 slots for volunteers to participate in this initiative.

Date: Saturday,12th October 2024
Time: 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM
Location: Abu Dhabi Cruise Terminal, Abu Dhabi Ports, Building No. 1


SIGN UP HERE <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fforms.office.com%252fr%252f8zLrsPeQYs%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWbJb05OCIKifivGeVK%252fdXTHUVS1mEBp8N52uD5vnf0NDWoSc6gVCwB224tpIXjUElHIygEMtOyDoUdBpsdRo9ZfmQv0GVd89j0GCL41izF7ChCVfhh1EeRN3uGz3EmvzZxih5%252bt4cetUf8Rd4XY2eXwJqXj4M5MlClGwzs0Uff9bvCTeQ2b9oBOAWN1qHgowBuUm1wiqdl1xXJHn61iX3YR9NFcK6q8F87hJfbbt1Duz&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ce784a14f614944cfc69108dce9cc3c8c%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638642310596888690%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=8mDgk5RM%2FgBSYTWLPpUvRXnPeDRn7TI2u%2FWkelM%2FRJM%3D&reserved=0> 


Volunteers will be selected on a first-come basis and contacted by the Sustainability team for confirmation.

Stay tuned for similar volunteering opportunities in Dubai next week.

For inquiries, please get in touch with us at Internal.Communications@chalhoub.com and to share your news in the Internal News please contact Yasmine.Uthman@chalhoub.com
